basics.name: Bertrand Dubaut
basics.label: Software Engineer/Ruby Developer/Elixir Enthusiast
basics.summary: I'm a French software engineer that lives in Brisbane, Australia. I am 28, speak fluent English and I have a Master's degree in Computer Science from one of the top Computer Engineering schools of France. I am a ruby developer (Ruby on Rails, Grape API...) with strong software and cloud architecture skills, I am anElixir enthusiast (functional programming), and I am also trying to up my skills with front-end technologies like React or Relay. My technology monitoring skills is also much appreciated as I know very well what is going on in our industry. On a personal note, I have played baseball all my life, including one year in California in college (where I injured my shoulder then came back to France to finish my Computer Science studies). I now play competitive Baseball and coach a youth team here in Brisbane for my spare time.

work.summary: Everydayhero is a crowdfunding platform aimed at charity fundraising.
Oomph is a platform for publishers and advertisers allowing them to create digital magazines or ads for mobile devices and tablets.

Visibleo is a web-marketing start-up based in the Paris Suburbs. They perform Facebook Ads and Google AdWords campaigns, while also creating websites for their clients. In charge of creating and developing web applications for the IT department of the company.

Reputation Squad is an E-Reputation agency in Paris: the company manages and monitors its clientsâ€™ reputation on the Internet. In charge of creating and developing web and social media monitoring tools for the agency
Consultant in projects for several large-scale French companies like Air France or Renault.
highlights: Managed a developer team based in India from France

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

education.title: Master's degree of computer science and software engineering
Bachelor's degree of computer science and software engineering
